title: Countries with the lowest infant mortality rate 2017
yAxis: Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.
The highest Country Luxembourg has 1.6 more Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births than the lowest Country Monaco.

mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births for 20 number of Countrys.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births is appeared to be the highest at Country Luxembourg and lowest at Country Monaco.

max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in the y axis.
Country Luxembourg has the highest Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births and Monaco has the lowest Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births.
Country Germany has the second highest value for Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births.
The Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births of Country Monaco is 1.89% smaller than the maximum value at Luxembourg.
Country Luxembourg is higher than any other Countrys with value 3.4, followed by Germany, and Germany. Down to Country Monaco with the lowest value 1.8.
Country Luxembourg, Austria, Belgium, and Germany have a similar Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births that is 3.4.
The average Child deaths in the first year of life per 1,000 live births in all 20 Countrys is 2.82.
Summing up the values of all Countrys, we get total 56.5.
